faq.q1: What is the best way to delete similar photos on iPhone?
faq.a1: Gallery Guy uses smart similarity detection to group nearly identical photos together. Just swipe through each group, pick your favorite, and delete the rest with one tap — no manual comparison needed.
faq.q2: How do I pick the best photo from burst shots on iPhone?
faq.a2: Gallery Guy automatically analyzes your burst shots and similar photos, then suggests the sharpest, best-composed frame. You can slide between photos to compare and confirm your choice — the easiest way to delete burst photos on iPhone.
faq.q3: How to delete duplicate photos on iPhone?
faq.a3: Download Gallery Guy from the App Store, let it scan your photo library and it will instantly group duplicates and near-duplicates. The easiest way to clean up your iPhone photo library — select the ones you want to keep and bulk-delete the rest.
faq.q4: Is there a free app to find and remove similar photos on iPhone?
faq.a4: Yes — Gallery Guy is completely free with no ads. It detects similar photos, blurry shots, screenshots, and large videos, helping you reclaim storage space on your iPhone.
faq.q5: Is there a swipe to delete photos app for iPhone?
faq.a5: Gallery Guy lets you swipe through similar photos just like a dating app — swipe to keep your favorites and delete the rest. It's the fastest way to clean up your photo library.
faq.q6: Is there a Tinder for photos app?
faq.a6: Gallery Guy works like Tinder for your photo gallery — it groups similar shots together and lets you swipe through them to pick the best one. Keep or delete with a simple swipe, making photo cleanup fast and fun.
faq.q7: Is there an iPhone photo cleaner with one-time purchase and no subscription?
faq.a7: Gallery Guy is a one-time purchase with lifetime access — no monthly subscription, no hidden fees. Pay once and get all features forever, including smart similar photo detection, blurry photo cleanup, and storage optimization.
faq.q8: Is there a fun photo cleaner app for iPhone?
faq.a8: Gallery Guy makes photo cleanup actually enjoyable — swipe through your photos like a dating app, slide to compare similar shots side by side, and watch your storage free up in real time. It turns a boring chore into a satisfying experience.
faq.q9: What is the best photo culling app for iPhone?
faq.a9: Gallery Guy is the fastest photo culling app for iPhone. It automatically groups similar and duplicate shots, suggests the best frame from each set, and lets you bulk-delete the rest. Perfect for culling vacation photos, event shots, or everyday bursts.
faq.q10: How to cull photos fast on iPhone?
faq.a10: Download Gallery Guy and let it scan your library — it groups similar photos instantly. Swipe through each group, keep the best shot, and delete the rest in bulk. What used to take hours now takes minutes.
faq.q11: Is Gallery Guy a good CleanMyPhone alternative?
faq.a11: Gallery Guy is a top alternative to CleanMyPhone — it offers smart similar photo detection, blurry photo cleanup, screenshot management, and large video finder. One-time purchase with no subscription, no ads, and full privacy protection.
faq.q12: Is Gallery Guy worth it? What do reviews say?
faq.a12: Gallery Guy is rated 4.9 stars on the App Store. Users love the swipe-to-compare feature, the photo culling feature that picks the best shot automatically, and the fact that it's a one-time purchase with no subscription. It's free to try with no ads.
faq.q13: iPhone storage full but nothing to delete — what should I do?
faq.a13: When your iPhone storage is full but you can't find anything to delete, the problem is usually hundreds of similar photos, old screenshots, and large videos hiding in your library. Gallery Guy scans everything and shows you exactly what's taking up space — remove duplicates, blurry shots, and forgotten videos to free up storage instantly.
faq.q14: What to do with thousands of iPhone photos?
faq.a14: Gallery Guy is built for exactly this — it scans thousands of photos in seconds, groups similar and duplicate shots together, and helps you keep only the best ones. Instead of scrolling through your entire library manually, let Gallery Guy organize and clean it for you.
faq.q15: How to organize iPhone photos and free up storage?
faq.a15: Gallery Guy helps you organize your iPhone photos by grouping similar shots, screenshots, and large videos separately. Pick the best photo from each group, delete the rest, and free up iPhone storage from photos you no longer need — no manual sorting required.
